tool_description: Creates structured editorial calendars with optimal posting schedules, content distribution across channels, and strategic timing based on audience behavior and business objectives.

content_pillars.description: Main content themes and pillars to include

posting_frequency_per_channel.description: Posts per week for each channel

campaign_dates.description: Important dates and campaigns to plan around

error_messages: Invalid calendar period: Must be between 30 and 365 days.
Mismatched arrays: publishing_channels and posting_frequency_per_channel must have same length.
Content pillar limits: Provide 2-10 content pillars for effective planning.
Frequency too high: Posting frequency should not exceed 21 posts per week per channel.
Invalid percentage distribution: content_mix_percentages must sum to 100 if provided.
usage: Specify calendar_period_days, content_pillars, publishing_channels, and posting_frequency_per_channel. Optionally add campaign_dates, content_mix_percentages, and weekend preferences. Returns detailed editorial calendar.

calendar_overview.description: Summary of calendar structure and approach

daily_schedule.description: Day-by-day posting schedule with content types

campaign_integration.description: How campaigns are integrated into calendar
